fieldUpdates.formula: if( Activity_Code__c == 'self_registered_scheduling' , 'Self Registered Scheduling' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'controlled_showing' , 'Controlled Scheduling' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'self_registered_viewing' , 'Self Registered Viewing' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'prelease_signup' , 'Pre-release Signup' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'application_started' , 'Application Started' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'application_applied' , 'Applied' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'application_approved' , 'Application Approved' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'application_canceled' , 'Application Cancelled' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'application_denied' , 'Application Denied' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'lease_signed' , 'Lease Signed' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'application_transfer' , 'Application Transfer' , if( Activity_Code__c == 'prospect_canceled' , 'Prospect Canceled',if( Activity_Code__c == 'phone_inquiry' , 'Phone Inquiry', if( Activity_Code__c == 'prospect' , 'Prospect', if( Activity_Code__c == 'prelease_alert' , 'Prelease Alert', if( Activity_Code__c == 'other' , 'Other', Activity_Code__c) )))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Update ORU activity name
